pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Methods Based on Projections and Related Concepts // Functionality to compute the projection median via several algorithms. Also provides functions to plot different multivariate medians and multivariate quantiles in two- dimensional and three-dimensional data respectively. See Chen, F and Nason, G P (2020) "A new method for computing the projection median, its influence curve and techniques for the production of projected quantile plots." PLOS One doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0229845.
